mapper.sql: mach_no, id, mach_name, mach_type, fuel_type, use_type, st_no, cus_no, model_no, vender_name, power_num, Purch_time, state, note, creat_time, creator, ver_no, maintain_time, stop_time, start_Voltage, volumeno, gprsno, maintain_date, maintain_num, i_total_generate_time, i_total_generate_cnt, b_deleted, b_activated, i_board_version
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from C_mach
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into C_mach (mach_no, id, mach_name, mach_type, fuel_type, use_type, st_no, cus_no, model_no, vender_name, power_num, Purch_time, state, note, creat_time, creator, ver_no, maintain_time, stop_time, start_Voltage, volumeno, gprsno, maintain_date, maintain_num, i_total_generate_time, i_total_generate_cnt, b_deleted, b_activated, i_board_version) values (#{machNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{machName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{machType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{fuelType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{stNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{venderName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{powerNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintainTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{stopTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{startVoltage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{volumeno,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gprsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maintainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maintainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalGenerateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalGenerateCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{activated,jdbcType=BIT}, #{boardVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update C_mach
mach_no = #{record.machNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mach_name = #{record.machName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
mach_type = #{record.machType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
fuel_type = #{record.fuelType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
use_type = #{record.useType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

maintain_time = #{record.maintainTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
stop_time = #{record.stopTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

i_total_generate_cnt = #{record.totalGenerateCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
b_activated = #{record.activated,jdbcType=BIT},
i_board_version = #{record.boardVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update C_mach set mach_no = #{record.machNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mach_name = #{record.machName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, mach_type = #{record.machType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, fuel_type = #{record.fuelType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, use_type = #{record.useType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, st_no = #{record.stNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_no = #{record.cusNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_no = #{record.modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vender_name = #{record.venderName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, power_num = #{record.powerNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Purch_time = #{record.purchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, creat_time = #{record.creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ver_no = #{record.verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_time = #{record.maintainTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, stop_time = #{record.stopTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, start_Voltage = #{record.startVoltage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, volumeno = #{record.volumeno,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, gprsno = #{record.gprsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_date = #{record.maintainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maintain_num = #{record.maintainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, i_total_generate_time = #{record.totalGenerateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, i_total_generate_cnt = #{record.totalGenerateCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, b_activated = #{record.activated,jdbcType=BIT}, i_board_version = #{record.boardVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update C_mach
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mach_name = #{machName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
mach_type = #{machType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
fuel_type = #{fuelType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
st_no = #{stNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_no = #{cusNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_no = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vender_name = #{venderName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
power_num = #{powerNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Purch_time = #{purchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ver_no = #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintain_time = #{maintainTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
start_Voltage = #{startVoltage,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
volumeno = #{volumeno,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
gprsno = #{gprsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintain_date = #{maintainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
maintain_num = #{maintainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_total_generate_time = #{totalGenerateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_total_generate_cnt = #{totalGenerateCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
b_activated = #{activated,jdbcType=BIT},
i_board_version = #{boardVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where mach_no = #{machNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update C_mach set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mach_name = #{machName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, mach_type = #{machType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, fuel_type = #{fuelType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, st_no = #{stNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_no = #{cusNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_no = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vender_name = #{venderName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, power_num = #{powerNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Purch_time = #{purchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ver_no = #{verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_time = #{maintainTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, start_Voltage = #{startVoltage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, volumeno = #{volumeno,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, gprsno = #{gprsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_date = #{maintainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maintain_num = #{maintainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, i_total_generate_time = #{totalGenerateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, i_total_generate_cnt = #{totalGenerateCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, b_activated = #{activated,jdbcType=BIT}, i_board_version = #{boardVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mach_no = #{machNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE C_mach set i_total_generate_time = dbo.sum_time(mach_no) , i_total_generate_cnt = dbo.sumnum_time(mach_no)
UPDATE ap_time set i_generate_time = DATEDIFF(mi, start_time, end_time)

update.foreach:
update C_mach
mach_name = #{item.machName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
mach_type = #{item.machType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
fuel_type = #{item.fuelType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
use_type = #{item.useType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

power_num = #{item.powerNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Purch_time = #{item.purchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{item.note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
creat_time = #{item.creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ver_no = #{item.verNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintain_time = #{item.maintainTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
stop_time = #{item.stopTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
start_Voltage = #{item.startVoltage,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
volumeno = #{item.volumeno,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
gprsno = #{item.gprsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

b_activated = #{item.activated,jdbcType=BIT},
i_board_version = #{boardVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where mach_no = #{item.machNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
